name: create-some-app
description: A configurable CLI-based scaffolder that creates some app
author: Wallace Sidhrée <i@dreamyguy.com> (https://github.com/dreamyguy)
copyright: Copyright (c) Wallace Sidhrée - All rights reserved.

scripts.release: npx bump --commit ':rocket: Release v' --tag --push package.json package-lock.json templates/fullstack-gatsby-sanity/package.json templates/fullstack-gatsby-sanity/backend/package.json templates/fullstack-gatsby-sanity/frontend/package.json templates/fullstack-next-sanity/package.json templates/fullstack-next-sanity/backend/package.json templates/fullstack-next-sanity/frontend/package.json && npm publish
